languages.text: Команда исследователей обращается в бегство, бросив самых нерасторопных товарищей на растерзание гигантским тварям. Пока мощные жвалы безобразных гадин с хрустом перемалывают тела несчастных в кровавую кашу, большей части отряда удается затаиться в уже исследованных туннелях. Когда стрекот жвал последней ксенотвари затихает в глубине пещер, отряд с осторожностью продвигается дальше.

traits.locale_text: Команда исследователей обращается в бегство, бросив самых нерасторопных товарищей на растерзание гигантским тварям. Пока мощные жвалы безобразных гадин с хрустом перемалывают тела несчастных в кровавую кашу, большей части отряда удается затаиться в уже исследованных туннелях. Когда стрекот жвал последней ксенотвари затихает в глубине пещер, отряд с осторожностью продвигается дальше.

languages.text: The exploration team turns to flee, leaving their tardier comrades at the mercy of the gigantic beasts. While the horrid monsters' powerful mandibles sickeningly crunch and mash their bodies into a bloody paste, the majority of the squad successfully escapes to hide in several already-explored tunnels. Once the rattle of the last xenoform's mandibles finally fades away in the cavernous depths, the squad cautiously advances further.
languages.original_text: Команда исследователей обращается в бегство, бросив самых нерасторопных товарищей на растерзание гигантским тварям. Когда стрекот жвал последней ксенотвари затихает в глубине пещер, отряд с осторожностью продвигается дальше.

Once the rattle of the last xenoform's mandibles finally fades away in the cavernous depths, the squad cautiously advances further.

The exploration team turns to flee, leaving their tardier comrades at the mercy of the gigantic beasts. While the horrid monsters' powerful mandibles sickeningly crunch and mash their bodies into a bloody paste, the majority of the squad successfully escapes to hide in several already-explored tunnels. Once the rattle of the last xenoform's mandibles finally fades away in the cavernous depths, the squad cautiously advances further.

languages.text: 探险队员转身逃跑，丢下了那些行动迟缓的战友。可怕怪物强而有力的下颚发出了令人作呕的嘎吱声，将受害者的躯体咬成了血淋淋的浆糊，但绝大多数成员顺利逃脱，躲进了几个之前探索过的隧道里。当最后一只异形怪物下颚发出的嘎吱声终于消失在洞穴深处时，小队才小心翼翼地继续前进。
languages.original_text: The exploration team turns to flee, leaving their tardier comrades at the mercy of the gigantic beasts. While the horrid monsters' powerful mandibles sickeningly crunch and mash their bodies into a bloody paste, the majority of the squad successfully escapes to hide in several already-explored tunnels. Once the rattle of the last xenoform's mandibles finally fades away in the cavernous depths, the squad cautiously advances further.

traits.locale_text: 探险队员转身逃跑，丢下了那些行动迟缓的战友。可怕怪物强而有力的下颚发出了令人作呕的嘎吱声，将受害者的躯体咬成了血淋淋的浆糊，但绝大多数成员顺利逃脱，躲进了几个之前探索过的隧道里。当最后一只异形怪物下颚发出的嘎吱声终于消失在洞穴深处时，小队才小心翼翼地继续前进。

languages.text: 隊員は逃げに転じ、遅れをとった仲間は巨大な獣の元に置き去りにされた。恐ろしい怪物たちの強力な大あごが、彼らの体を吐き気が催すほど粉々に粉砕する間、部隊の大部分は脱出に成功し、すでに探索済みのトンネルの中に隠れた。最後の異形の大あごのガラガラという音が洞窟の奥底に消え去ると、隊員たちは慎重に前進する。
languages.original_text: The exploration team turns to flee, leaving their tardier comrades at the mercy of the gigantic beasts. While the horrid monsters' powerful mandibles sickeningly crunch and mash their bodies into a bloody paste, the majority of the squad successfully escapes to hide in several already-explored tunnels. Once the rattle of the last xenoform's mandibles finally fades away in the cavernous depths, the squad cautiously advances further.

traits.locale_text: 隊員は逃げに転じ、遅れをとった仲間は巨大な獣の元に置き去りにされた。恐ろしい怪物たちの強力な大あごが、彼らの体を吐き気が催すほど粉々に粉砕する間、部隊の大部分は脱出に成功し、すでに探索済みのトンネルの中に隠れた。最後の異形の大あごのガラガラという音が洞窟の奥底に消え去ると、隊員たちは慎重に前進する。

languages.text: El equipo de exploración se da la vuelta para huir, dejando a sus compañeros más rezagados a merced de las gigantescas bestias. Mientras las poderosas mandíbulas de los horribles monstruos trituran y machacan sus cuerpos hasta convertirlos en una pasta sanguinolenta, la mayoría del equipo escapa con éxito para esconderse en varios túneles ya explorados. Una vez que el estruendo de las mandíbulas de la última xenoforma desaparece en las profundidades cavernosas, el escuadrón avanza con cautela.
languages.original_text: The exploration team turns to flee, leaving their tardier comrades at the mercy of the gigantic beasts. While the horrid monsters' powerful mandibles sickeningly crunch and mash their bodies into a bloody paste, the majority of the squad successfully escapes to hide in several already-explored tunnels. Once the rattle of the last xenoform's mandibles finally fades away in the cavernous depths, the squad cautiously advances further.

traits.locale_text: El equipo de exploración se da la vuelta para huir, dejando a sus compañeros más rezagados a merced de las gigantescas bestias. Mientras las poderosas mandíbulas de los horribles monstruos trituran y machacan sus cuerpos hasta convertirlos en una pasta sanguinolenta, la mayoría del equipo escapa con éxito para esconderse en varios túneles ya explorados. Una vez que el estruendo de las mandíbulas de la última xenoforma desaparece en las profundidades cavernosas, el escuadrón avanza con cautela.{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}

languages.text: Das Erkundungsteam macht auf dem Absatz kehrt, um zu fliehen. Die trägeren Kameraden werden der Gnade der riesigen Monster überlassen. Während die Zähne der grauenhaften Ungeheuer die unglückseligen Soldaten zu einem blutigen Brei verarbeiten, kann der Großteil des Teams entkommen, indem er sich in den bereits erkundeten Tunneln versteckt. Nachdem das Schmatzen und Rasseln des letzten Xenos endlich in den Tiefen der Höhle verklungen ist, wagt das Team sich vorsichtig weiter.
languages.original_text: The exploration team turns to flee, leaving their tardier comrades at the mercy of the gigantic beasts. While the horrid monsters' powerful mandibles sickeningly crunch and mash their bodies into a bloody paste, the majority of the squad successfully escapes to hide in several already-explored tunnels. Once the rattle of the last xenoform's mandibles finally fades away in the cavernous depths, the squad cautiously advances further.

traits.locale_text: Das Erkundungsteam macht auf dem Absatz kehrt, um zu fliehen. Die trägeren Kameraden werden der Gnade der riesigen Monster überlassen. Während die Zähne der grauenhaften Ungeheuer die unglückseligen Soldaten zu einem blutigen Brei verarbeiten, kann der Großteil des Teams entkommen, indem er sich in den bereits erkundeten Tunneln versteckt. Nachdem das Schmatzen und Rasseln des letzten Xenos endlich in den Tiefen der Höhle verklungen ist, wagt das Team sich vorsichtig weiter.

languages.text: L'équipe d'exploration tourne aussitôt les talons, abandonnant les retardataires à la merci des créatures monstrueuses. Alors que les puissantes mandibules broient leurs victimes avec force craquements sinistres et les réduisent à l'état de bouillie sanguinolente, la majeure partie de l'expédition parvient à s'échapper pour aller se cacher dans des tunnels préalablement explorés. Terrifiés, les survivants ne se décident à repartir qu'une fois que le claquement des mâchoires s'est enfin dissipé dans les profondeurs caverneuses.
languages.original_text: The exploration team turns to flee, leaving their tardier comrades at the mercy of the gigantic beasts. While the horrid monsters' powerful mandibles sickeningly crunch and mash their bodies into a bloody paste, the majority of the squad successfully escapes to hide in several already-explored tunnels. Once the rattle of the last xenoform's mandibles finally fades away in the cavernous depths, the squad cautiously advances further.

traits.locale_text: L'équipe d'exploration tourne aussitôt les talons, abandonnant les retardataires à la merci des créatures monstrueuses. Alors que les puissantes mandibules broient leurs victimes avec force craquements sinistres et les réduisent à l'état de bouillie sanguinolente, la majeure partie de l'expédition parvient à s'échapper pour aller se cacher dans des tunnels préalablement explorés. Terrifiés, les survivants ne se décident à repartir qu'une fois que le claquement des mâchoires s'est enfin dissipé dans les profondeurs caverneuses.

languages.text: Keşif ekibi arkasını dönüp kaçarak yavaş kalan yoldaşlarını devasa yaratıkların insafına bırakıyor. Korkunç yaratıkların güçlü çene kemikleri geride kalan askerlerin vücutlarını iğrenç bir şekilde çiğneye çiğneye öğütüp macuna çeviriyor. Bu esnada ekibin çoğuysa kaçmayı başarıp çoktan keşfedilen tünellerden birkaçında saklanıyor. Mağaranın derinliklerindeki zenoformların çene kemiklerinin takırtısı azalarak son bulduğunda ekip ilerlemeye temkinle devam ediyor.
languages.original_text: The exploration team turns to flee, leaving their tardier comrades at the mercy of the gigantic beasts. While the horrid monsters' powerful mandibles sickeningly crunch and mash their bodies into a bloody paste, the majority of the squad successfully escapes to hide in several already-explored tunnels. Once the rattle of the last xenoform's mandibles finally fades away in the cavernous depths, the squad cautiously advances further.
